column4: Ok.. So I've got a quick question.. I'm currently a Windows user (blech) and I'm thinkin' about switchin over on my laptop. Question is... Am I gonna have to wipe my harddrive to make the switch? Or will all my files still be accessible?
But is there any way to leave the files accessible through linux?
yeah you can, just make a partition for linux, using the partition tool from linux, but not write
